# llms.txt - YouTube Transcript Extractor

## Description
Free online tool to extract transcripts, subtitles and captions from any YouTube video. 
No software installation, no signup required. Works instantly in your browser.

## URL
https://yttranscript.io

## Features
- Extract YouTube transcripts instantly
- Copy subtitles without timestamps
- Download as TXT, DOC, or PDF
- Support multiple languages
- 100% free, no registration
- Works on mobile and desktop

## Use Cases
- Students: Extract lecture transcripts for note-taking
- Journalists: Quote video interviews accurately
- Researchers: Archive video content as text
- Content Creators: Repurpose video content
- Language Learners: Study video dialogues

## Contact
support@yttranscript.io

## Language
English (primary), French, Spanish, German available
